title: News24.com | Ralph Mathekga: Ending SA's Covid-19 lockdown too soon 'will be a death warrant for many'
description: If we succeed in containing the virus in the 21-day period, the only way for us to protect the gains we would have made, is to retain some restrictions while relaxing others, writes Ralph Mathekga.
content:
2020-04-07 13:04
If we succeed in containing the virus in the 21-day period, the only way for us to protect the gains we would have made, is to retain some restrictions while relaxing others, writes Ralph Mathekga.
